item.title: About
item.description: Hey! Welocome to visit my blog.Feel relax to read and share your thought with me.Have a nice day! About Me I live and grow up in China.So uh…you may found many posts in Chinese,and poor English posts.I will be grateful if you pointed out my mistake,whether language or something else.And I will try my best to write in English,because it is universal. I am interested in life sciences and computer.I

item.title: Use utterances in blog
item.description:
Official Introduction1

A lightweight comments widget built on GitHub issues. Use GitHub issues for blog comments, wiki pages and more!

  • Open source. 🙌
  • No tracking, no ads, always free. 📡🚫
  • No lock-in. All data stored in GitHub issues.
  • Styled with Primer, the css toolkit that powers GitHub. 💅
  • Dark theme. 🌘
  • Lightweight. Vanilla TypeScript. No font downloads, JavaScript frameworks or polyfills for evergreen browsers. 🐦🌲
